isis.stitle: TSI 92-04-02 - Location of Seals in Pressure Differential Valve

subjectgroup.subject: Location of Seals in Pressure Differential Valve

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all vehicles with hydraulic brakes.

The Hydro-Max Brake Booster with Split Hydraulic Brake System (CTS-5018, Chapter IV) Service Manual Section has an error in Figure 13 on page 11. The "O" ring seal next to the centering ring (sleeve) is shown in the wrong position on the spool. The following illustration shows the seal in the proper position on the spool. The illustration in CTS-5018 shows the "O" ring seal on the right side of the centering ring instead of as illustrated in Figure 1. If the "O" ring seal is installed on the right side of the centering ring, the valve will leak brake fluid from the sensor opening and will not center properly.

Instruction number 17 on page 13 of CTS-5018, Chapter IV, explains how to install the "O" ring seals as illustrated in Figure 13. Disregard instruction number 17 and install the "O" ring seals as illustrated in Figure 1.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Proper "O" Ring Seal Installation On The Pressure Differential Valve Spool

geninfo.para: This error in CTS-5018, Chapter IV, will be corrected at the next revision. it is suggested that a copy of this TSI be placed on page 13, in CTS-5018, Chapter IV.
